tuv.seg: The main duty of the Irish Ombudsman is to investigate complaints made by members of the public about how they have been treated by public bodies in Ireland
Is é príomh dhualgas an Ombudsman fiosrú a dhéanamh ar aon ghearán a dhéanann duine faoin tslí ar chaith eagraíocht phoiblí leis/léi
The Ombudsman can examine decisions, refusals to take action and administrative procedures of public bodies
Tá sé de chead ag an Ombudsman cinneadh a cheistniú, nó fiafraí cén fáth nár déanadh aon ní faoi ghearán, nó féachaint isteach i módh riaracháin na n-eagraíochtaí poiblí
The Irish Ombudsman is appointed by the Irish President following nomination by both Houses of the Oireachtas (the Irish parliament)
Toghann an tUachtarán an Ombudsman i ndiaidh don Oireachtas é/í a ainmniú
You can find information on the current Ombudsman here
Tá eolas ar an Ombudsman laithreach anseo
The Ombudsman can demand any information, document or file from the body complained of
Tá sé de chead ag an Ombudsman aon eolas, cáipéis nó eile a fháil ó na heagraíochtaí atá i gceist
The Ombudsman is not a political office and he or she must remain independent in the performance of the functions of Ombudsman
Ní post polaitiúil é an Ombudsman agus ní mór dó/dí déanamh cinnte de go mbíonn sé/sí neamhspléach sa bhealach a dhéanann sé/sí a c(h)uid oibre
The Ombudsman stays in office for 6 years
Bíonn tréimhse 6 bliana ag an Ombudsman sa phost
He or she may resign or may be removed from office because of misbehaviour, incapacity or bankruptcy
Tá sé de chead aige/aici éirigh as an bpost nó is féidir é/í a bhriseadh as an bpost ar chúiseanna mí-iompair, neamhábaltachta nó clisiúnachais
He or she must retire at the age of 67 years
Tá air/ uirthi éirigh as an bpost ag aois a 67 bliain
You can make a complaint if you are unhappy with the service provided by any of the following bodies:
Is féidir gearán a dhéanamh má tá tú mí-shásta leis an tseirbhís a thugann aon cheann de na heagraíochtaí seo a leanas:
The Ombudsman (Amendment) Act 2012 brought over 180 additional public bodies under the remit of the Ombudsman with effect from 1 May 2013, including publicly funded third-level education bodies

Thug an tAcht Ombudsman (Leasú) 2012 os cionn 180 comhlacht poiblí breise faoi shainchúram an Ombudsman le héifeacht ón 1 Bealtaine 2013, lena n-áirítear comhlachtaí oideachais tríú leibhéal atá maoinithe go poiblí
The Office has compiled an indicative list of these public bodies
Tá an Oifig i dtoll a chéile liosta táscach de na comhlachtaí poiblí
How complaints to the Ombudsman are investigated
Conas a dhéanann an Ombudsman fiosrú ar ghearáin
If you make a complaint to the Ombudsman, he or she will carry out a preliminary examination
I dtosach déanann an Ombudsman réamh-fhiosrú nuair a dhéanann tú gearán leis/léi
The preliminary examination is a quick and informal way of deciding whether a formal investigation is necessary
Sa réamh-fhiosrú faightear amach an bhfuil gá le fiosrú foirmiúil nó nach bhfuil
During the preliminary examination the Ombudsman will decide whether the action of the public body that you complained about affected you in a negative way
Sa réamh-fhiosrú socraíonn an Ombudsman ar chuir an rud a rinneadh an t-eagraíocht phoiblí atá i gceist sa chás isteach ort i mbealach diúltach
You may be interviewed by the Ombudsman in an informal way at this stage
Uaireanta, cuireann an Ombudsman agallamh ort i mbealach neamh fhoirimiúil ag an am seo
The Ombudsman will then consider if the action that you complained about:
Socraíonn an Ombudsman, ansin, an raibh an gníomh faoinar rinneadh tú an gearán:
• Was made without proper authority
• Déanta gan an t-udarás cuí
• Was made on irrelevant grounds
• Déanta ar chúiseanna fánacha
• Was made in a negligent or careless manner
• Déanta i mbealach fánach nó fáillíoch
• Was based on wrong or incomplete information
• Bunaithe ar eolas mícheart nó neamh chruinn
• Was based on bad administrative practice or
• Bunaithe ar dhroch chleachtadh riaracháin nó
• Was otherwise an example of unfair or unsound administration
• Ag léiriú riarachán míchothromach nó fabhtach
Most complaints do not go any further than the preliminary investigation stage
Ní théann móran de na gearáin thar an bpointe seo fiosrúcháin
The next step in the process is for the Ombudsman to carry out a formal investigation
Sa chéad chéim eile den phróiséas cuireann an Ombudsman fiosrúchán foirmiúil ar bun
The Ombudsman will draft a Statement of Complaint in consultation with you
Déanfaidh an Ombudsman, i gcomhar leatsa, amach Ráiteas Gearáin
The investigation will be carried out in private and usually in writing
Déanfar an fiosrúchán go príobháideach agus i scríbhinn, de ghnáth
The Ombudsman may demand any information, files or documents to help him or her carry out the investigation
Cuirfidh an Ombudsman fios ar aon eolas, cáipéis nó eile a chuideoidh leis/léi an fiosrúchán a dhéanamh
At the end of the investigation process, the Ombudsman must inform you of the decision
Ag deireadh an phróiséis fhiosrúcháin nó mór don Ombudsman insint duit cén cinneadh atá tógadh aige/ aici
The Ombudsman only has the power to make a recommendation. His or her findings are not legally binding and the Ombudsman cannot force the body to accept or act upon the decision
Níl cumhacht dlí ag an toradh seo agus ní féidir leis an Ombudsman iallach a chuir ar an eagraíocht glacadh leis nó aon rud a dhéanamh faoi
If the body that you complained about fails to act upon the decision of the Ombudsman, the Ombudsman may make a report to the Houses of the Oireachtas
Muna ndéanann an eagraíocht a bhí i gceist sa ghearán aon ní faoin toradh is féidir leis an Ombudsman tuairisc a chuir ós comhair Tithe an Oireachtais faoin gcás
Complaints that the Ombudsman cannot investigate
Gearáin nach féidir leis an Ombudsman fiosrú
There are situations where the Ombudsman cannot carry out an investigation of your complaint:
Tá cásanna gearáin ann nach féidir leis an Ombudsman fiosrú ar do shon:
• Where your complaint is about a private company, individual, private practitioner, dentist, optician, pharmacist, etc
• Sa chás gur in aghaidh duine príobháideach, eagraíocht phríobháideach, cleachtóir príobháideach mar fhiaclóir, dochtúir súl & rl, a dhéantar an gearán
• Where your complaint is about the clinical judgement of a doctor
• Má tá do ghearán faoi chinneadh gairimiúil dochtúra
• Where any minister of the Government sends a request in writing to the Ombudsman to cease the investigation
• Má chuireann aon Aire Rialtais iarratas i scríbhinn chuig an Ombudsman ag iarraidh air éirigh as an bhfiosrúchán
• Where the matter you complained is being decided by the courts
• Má tá an gearán a rinne tú á phlé sna Cúirteanna
• Where legislation gives you a right of appeal against the decision of the public body to the courts
• Má tá cead faoin dlí agat dul chuig an gCúirt faoin ngearán in aghaidh na heagraíochta poiblí atá i gceist
• Where legislation gives you a right of appeal against the decision of the public body to an independent appeal body
• Má tá eagraíocht neamhspléach achomhairc ar fáil gur féidir an cinneadh a thóg an eagraíocht phoiblí a chur ós a chomhair
• Where the decision or action of the public body that you complained about relates to recruitment or the terms and conditions of employment
• Má bhaineann an cheist gearáin in aghaidh na heagraíochta poiblí le coinníollacha oibre nó le hearcaíocht foirne san eagraíocht úd
• Where you are complaining about a decision relating to immigration or naturalisation
• Má bhaineann do ghearán le cinneadh faoi inimirce nó faoi headóirseacht
• Where you are complaining about a decision relating to a pardon or remission of prison sentences
• Má bhaineann do ghearán le cinneadh faoi loghadh nó pardún ar théarma príosúin
• Where you are complaining about the actions of the Gardai or the administration of a prison
• Má bhaineann do ghearán le cinneadh faoi na Gardaí nó faoi bhainistíocht phriosúin
There is no charge for making a complaint to the Ombudsman
Níl aon chostas ar ghearán a chuir chuig an Ombudsman
You must make your complaint to the Ombudsman as soon as possible
Ní mór an gearán a dhéanamh chomh luath agus is féidir é
The time limit for making a complaint about a decision or action of a body is 12 months
Tá ort an gearán, faoi chinneadh nó faoi ghníomh éigin in aghaidh eagraíochta poiblí, a dhéanamh taobh istigh de 12 mí i ndiaidh don eachtra tarlú nó i ndiaidh an chinneadh a bheith tógtha
Time starts to run from the date the decision is made, or action is taken or from the date that you become aware that the decision or action occurred
Is féidir go dtógfaí an dáta ón uair gur cuireadh ar an eolas tú faoin gcinneadh nó faoin eachtra
You may make your complaint in writing, online, by telephone or by e-mail
Is féidir an gearán a dhéanamh i scríbhinn, ar líne, ar teileafón nó ar ríomh-phost
You should include any relevant documentation or correspondence
Ba chóir duit aon cháipéis nó litreacha a bhaineann leis an ngearán a chuir isteach leis an ngearán
The Office of the Ombudsman is open from 9.15am to 5.30pm
Tá Oifig an Ombudsman oscailte ó 9.15r.n. go dtí 5.30 i.n
The Ombudsman also maintains monthly regional offices and organises an annual programme of regional visits
Coinnigh an Ombudsman 12 oifige míosúil réigiúnach agus eagraítear clár bliantúíl cuairteanna réigiúnacha
